properties.areaDesc: Williams, OH; Defiance, OH; Fulton, OH
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:10PM EST until January 30 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers...

Tiffin River At Stryker affecting Defiance...Fulton and Williams
Counties

.Snow melt over the past few days has caused the Tiffin River at Stryker to rise. The river is expected to rise into minor flood stage.

The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Tiffin River At Stryker
* until late Wednesday night.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 11.0 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Monday evening and
crest near 11.2 feet around 1 PM Tuesday January 28 and fall below
flood stage around 1 AM Wednesday January 29.
* At 11.0 feet...Flooding of lowland areas around Stryker can be
expected.
* This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.9 feet which occurred
on Jun 1 2015.
properties.instruction:
Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep
to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood
waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further
statements and updated forecasts.

Detailed river forecasts and more information can be found on the
internet at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.

All times are in Eastern Time. This statement will be updated in
about 24 hours or sooner if necessary.
